ConversationMessageDefinition.label: When will I earn my staking rewards?

primitiveValues.formulaTemplate:
Staking rewards are redeemed automatically and sent to your wallet at regular intervals.

Payout frequency depends on the asset:
Daily: DOT, ADA, SOL, ATOM, TIA, INJ, SEI, SUI, POL, S
Weekly: ETH, GRT

Once your staking plan is confirmed, there's a bonding period before rewards begin. This ranges from 1-3 days depending on the asset.

To learn more about payout frequencies, please visit https://ndax.io/en/support/staking/earning-staking-rewards

Let us know if you'd like help checking the bonding and payout details for a specific asset!
